item.title: Readings shared October 13, 2025
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:

  • A tale of two lambdas: A haskeller’s journey into OCaml. ~ Richard A. Eisenberg. #Haskell #OCaml #FunctionalProgramming
